name: Hidden Shapes - Trick or Cats
description:
A game with cute creative kittens who love Halloween and go out in costumes to play trick or treats!



Be amazed by the minimalist style and beautiful art of this game!
The arts of Hidden Shapes - Trick or Cats are inspired by the big day of Halloween!



Relax with these cute Halloween-inspired hand-drawn jigsaw puzzles of our kittens and forget about your worries!



So that you can have fun and enjoy the game more, after solving a puzzle the complete art will be released, so at any time you can have fun again solving the entire puzzle.

- Steam Community

Don't forget to follow us on the Steam page so you'll know about new games and news from the studio.
